title: Web Development
description:
Job Summary:
We are looking for a skilled and passionate Web Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing, coding, and improving our company web pages, programs, and applications. As a web developer, you should be able to write clean code and ensure high performance and responsiveness of web applications across devices and platforms.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop functional and appealing web applications based on usability and business requirements.

Create well-designed, testable, and efficient code using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other web technologies.

Build and maintain responsive websites using frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.

Integrate RESTful APIs and backend services.

Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.

Maintain and improve the company website, monitor performance, and fix bugs.

Collaborate with UI/UX designers, other developers, and stakeholders.

Ensure high quality graphic standards and brand consistency.

Stay up to date with emerging technologies and trends.
requirements: Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent experience).
Proficiency in front-end technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and modern JavaScript libraries/frameworks.
Experience with backend technologies (Node.js, PHP, Python, or similar).
Knowledge of database systems like MySQL, MongoDB, or PostgreSQL.
Familiarity with version control tools like Git.
Understanding of SEO principles and responsive design.
Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
